text: Zlatan "Zlatko" Saračević (5 July 1961 – 21 February 2021) was a Croatian professional handball player and coach. He competed in the 1988 Summer Olympics for Yugoslavia and in the 1996 Summer Olympics for Croatia. After the domestic league match between RK Podravka, of which he was coach, and RK Lokomotiva. He was a commentator on RTL Televizija together with Filip Brkić. Saračević died of cardiac arrest in Koprivnica on 21 February 2021, aged 59. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Olympic gold medalists for Croatia Category:Sports commentators Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia
title: Zlatko Saračević
